articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.title: Adani in talks for first major debt refinancing after Hindenburg - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The ports-to-power conglomerate owned by Indian tycoon Gautam Adani is mulling whether to convert the original loan into debt with a longer maturity period and has started talking to banks individually about that plan.
articles.content: Adani Group is in talks with lenders, including global banks, as it seeks to refinance up to $3.8 billion of a loan facility taken for its acquisition of Ambuja Cements Ltd. last year, said people fa… [+2155 chars]
